entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow early this evening. Local blowing snow this evening and overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 early this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow in the morning. Blowing snow in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 50 gusting to 80 in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Light snow and blowing snow. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Light snow. Blowing snow in the evening. Local blowing snow overnight. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Sunday 19 March 2023
